alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Jim Hogg (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued December 25 at 2:54AM CST until December 25 at 8:00AM CST by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM CST THIS MORNING... ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 8 AM CST MONDAY... * WHAT...For the Hard Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 26. For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30 expected. * WHERE...Jim Hogg and Brooks Counties. * WHEN...For the Hard Freeze Warning, until 8 AM CST this morning. For the Freeze Warning, from midnight tonight to 8 AM CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
